layerFeed.name: Prestige Layer Pre-Starter Feed
layerFeed.description: Specialized feed for young layer chicks in the pre-starter phase.
layerFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
layerFeed.usage: Feed from day 1 to day 7 to provide essential nutrients for healthy growth.

layerFeed.name: Prestige Layer Starter Feed
layerFeed.description: Nutritious feed for layer chickens during the starter phase.
layerFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
layerFeed.usage: Feed from day 8 to day 21 to support optimal growth and development.

layerFeed.name: Prestige Layer Grower Feed
layerFeed.description: Balanced feed for layer chickens during the grower phase.
layerFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
layerFeed.usage: Feed from day 22 to day 35 to ensure proper weight gain and egg production.

layerFeed.name: Prestige Layer Finisher Feed
layerFeed.description: Final phase feed for layer chickens during the finishing stage.
layerFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
layerFeed.usage: Feed from day 36 onwards to support optimal egg quality and overall health.
